note.p: Daughter and heiress of Henry Scott of Belford, Roxburghshire. Married firstly Sir John James Douglas, 3d baronet (1792–1836), of Springwood Park, Kelso, who took the surname Scott Douglas, in 1822; secondly, William Scott Kerr of Chatto, of Sunlaw, Roxburgh, in 1837. Died in Paris.
